sentences.en: About medical respect ( dermatological department ) mediocre person does not flinch!
sentences.cn: 关于医学方面 ( 皮肤科 ) 庸人勿挠!

sentences.en: Every time I tell you I love you, you flinch.
sentences.cn: 每次我告诉你我爱你, 你总是退缩.

sentences.en: He did not flinch from his duty.
He listen to the jeers of the crowd without flinch.
sentences.cn: 他毫不畏惧地听著群众的嘲笑.

sentences.en: If I flinch when you say you love me, it's both our problems.
sentences.cn: 如果在你说你爱我时我退缩了, 那是我们两人的问题.

sentences.en: If you flinch, I'll kill you . Do you understand that?
sentences.cn: 你要是缩头不干, 我就宰了你, 明白 吗 ?

sentences.en: Leo stared back at him without flinching.
sentences.cn: 利奥毫不畏缩地回瞪着他。

sentences.en: Rhett, watching Wade's face with meditative eyes, saw the boy flinch.
sentences.cn: 瑞德若有所思地注视着韦德那张小脸, 发现这孩子在难过.

sentences.en: She couldn't deal him a social blow - there was no question about this and he didn't flinch.
sentences.cn: 在社交场上,她别想伤他一根毫毛;这是毫无疑问的.因此他毫不退缩.

sentences.en: She won't flinch from speaking her mind.
sentences.cn: 她不会讳言自己的想法.

sentences.en: The sharp surface of the rock caught at her skin, making her flinch.
sentences.cn: 岩石尖尖的表面剐到了她的皮肤，令她后缩了一下。

sentences.en: To draw back or shy away, as from fear ; flinch.
sentences.cn: 畏缩由于害怕等退缩或畏缩;退缩.

sentences.en: We will never flinch from difficulties.
sentences.cn: 我们面对困难决不退缩.

sentences.en: What a tribute to his ability not to flinch in the face of storm and stress!
sentences.cn: 这真是对他那面对暴风骤雨毫不畏缩的本领的大表扬!

sentences.en: When does my right hand flinch bone fracture can ride a bicycle?
sentences.cn: 我右手挠骨骨折什么时候可以骑自行车 吗 ?

sentences.en: You mustn't flinch from a difficulty.
sentences.cn: 你不应从困难面前退缩.

trans.tran_en: the act or an instance of drawing back

trans.tran_cn: 畏缩, 退缩, 畏首畏尾
trans.tran_en: to move your face or body away from someone or something because you are in pain, frightened, or upset
